rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0001
rows.name:
I see you've awakened
the sealed Blade...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0002
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0003
rows.name: Your Majesty...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0004
rows.name: King Serich...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0005
rows.name: Old man...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0006
rows.name:
It's been quite some time since I last
saw this place.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0007
rows.name:
We used to play here as children, you
know...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0009
rows.name:
Tell me, do you know why it is that
Theospiti Temple was destroyed?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0010
rows.name: No, I'm afraid I don't...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0011
rows.name: Hmm, no idea.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0012
rows.name: I'm afraid I do not know.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0013
rows.name:
I know it's been ruined for ages,
but I ain't never heard why.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0014
rows.name: It was a Blade going berserk...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0015
rows.name:
They say its power was so immense
that even its Driver couldn't
control it...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0016
rows.name:
The berserk Blade couldn't be stopped by
anyone, and it was only contained
when the Driver took their own life.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0017
rows.name:
Afterwards, the Core Crystal
was sealed away.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0018
rows.name:
It was buried in the ruins of this
temple, the site of the disaster,
as a warning to others.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0019
rows.name:
That Blade that went on a rampage,
could it possibly be...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0020
rows.name:
You mean, the Blade that went
berserk is...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0021
rows.name:
You mean, the Blade that went
berserk is...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0022
rows.name:
You mean, the Blade that went
berserk is...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0023
rows.name:
hat's right.
It's Ten'i standing right there...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0024
rows.name:
I have no recollection of this...
But somehow, I know it to be true.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0025
rows.name: At times, I can sense it...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0026
rows.name: The unfathomable power within me...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0027
rows.name:
Your Majesty...
I am prepared to accept whatever
punishment you deem fit...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0028
rows.name:
Feel free to shatter my Core Crystal
and consign me to oblivion...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0029
rows.name: What should I say to Ten'i?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0030
rows.name: I'll respect your decision.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0031
rows.name: I'll keep you in check.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0032
rows.name: How should I answer Ten'i?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0033
rows.name: I'll respect your decision.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0034
rows.name: I'll keep you in check.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0035
rows.name: How should I answer Ten'i?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0036
rows.name: I'll respect your decision.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0037
rows.name: I'll keep you in check.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0038
rows.name: How should I answer Ten'i?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0039
rows.name: I'll respect your decision.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0040
rows.name: I'll keep you in check.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0101
rows.name: Thank you.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0102
rows.name: Well then, Your Majesty.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0103
rows.name:
Hold on.
Isn't it premature
to make such a decision?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0104
rows.name:
According to legend, Ten'i's power
would be invaluable
in our upcoming battles.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0105
rows.name:
Ten'i,
your Driver has talent and strength...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0106
rows.name: And above all, an indomitable will...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0107
rows.name:
Besides, Heaven's Holy Grail
is journeying alongside you, is it not?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0108
rows.name:
Your current Driver is clearly nothing
like the one from centuries ago.
There's no risk of you losing control.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0109
rows.name:
My purpose in coming here
was not to seal you away...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0110
rows.name:
I came to encourage you to use your
full potential and serve
as a valuable ally to your Driver.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0112
rows.name: Ten'i...?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0113
rows.name: Ten'i...?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0114
rows.name: Ten'i...?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0115
rows.name: Ten'i...?

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0116
rows.name: I will comply.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0117
rows.name:
If that is how I can atone
for my sins...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0118
rows.name:
Hmph...
It seems she'll need more time
to come to terms with this.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0119
rows.name: Nevertheless, I'm entrusting her to you.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0120
rows.name: Sure. You can count on me!

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0121
rows.name: Sure. You can count on me!

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0122
rows.name: Leave it to me, Your Majesty.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0123
rows.name: Sure. You can count on me!

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0201
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0202
rows.name: Nia...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0203
rows.name: Meleph...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0204
rows.name: Zeke...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0205
rows.name:
Ha ha ha!
Just as I expected.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0206
rows.name: Listen well, Ten'i.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0207
rows.name:
It appears your Driver
has great faith in you.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0208
rows.name:
And I personally
trust your Driver's judgment.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0209
rows.name:
Even if you were to regain
memories of your past,
you shouldn't let it trouble you...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0210
rows.name:
Don't let the past define you.
Become a source of strength
for your Driver...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0211
rows.name: That's what I came to tell you.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0212
rows.name: But I must atone for my sins.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0213
rows.name:
It's understandable that you feel that
way,but there are many paths
to redemption.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0214
rows.name:
Becoming your Driver's strength
in the increasingly fierce battles to
come is also one form of atonement.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0215
rows.name: Is that so...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0216
rows.name: Absolutely. We need your power, Ten'i.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0217
rows.name:
That's why I hope you
won't dwell on the past
and will join us in battle.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0218
rows.name: Yeah, we need you, Ten'i.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0219
rows.name:
No point crying over spilled milk.
Come with us. Fight with us!

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0220
rows.name: That's right. We need you, Ten'i.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0221
rows.name:
The past is the past. You should leave
it behind and fight at our side.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0222
rows.name: Yeah, we need you, Ten'i.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0223
rows.name:
What happened, happened. But now,
we want you on our side. Come with
us!

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0224
rows.name: I understand...

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0225
rows.name: I'll try.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0226
rows.name:
Fear not.
Whatever happens, you have
a capable Driver by your side.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0227
rows.name: Your Majesty...thank you.

rows.label: kizunatalk079_msg0228
rows.name:
Indeed...
I'm counting on you.
